description._content: Image taken from: Title: "With the Colours; or, the piping times of peace ... With illustrations by R. Simkin" Author: JEPHSON, Richard Mounteney. Contributor: SIMKIN, Richard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12641.dd.17." Page: 267 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1881 Publisher: G. Routledge & Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001865061 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
